problems.title: Power Function Using Recursion
problems.description:
Given two integers A and B, compute A^B using recursion. Assume B >= 0.

Input Format:
Two integers A and B separated by space.

Output Format:
Print a single integer representing A raised to the power B.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
2 3

Sample Output
8

Sample Input
5 0

Sample Output
1
hintsList: Base case: if b == 0 return 1. Recursive case: a * power(a, b-1).
